thankyoubox

Class ThankYouRideController

  • java.lang.Object
    • thankyoubox.ThankYouRideController

  • public class ThankYouRideController
extends java.lang.Object
    This scene allows the user to rate the the driver they picked from the tableview in scheduled.ViewDriverController. Date 11/21/2018

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ThankYouRideController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initialize()
      When the scene is first loaded, the driver username will populate the label field.
      void performRatingCalculation(User person)
      When this method is called, it will add the new calculated rating for the driver into the RATING column USERINFO table.
      static void pushAverageRatingToDatabase(User person)
      When this method is called, it will add the new calculated user rating for the driver to the RATING column in the USERINFO table.
      void submitButtonPushed()
      When this button is pushed, it will add the new calculated rating for the driver into the RATING column USERINFO table.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ThankYouRideController

        public ThankYouRideController()

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        When the scene is first loaded, the driver username will populate the label field.

      • submitButtonPushed

        public void submitButtonPushed()
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               java.sql.SQLException
        When this button is pushed, it will add the new calculated rating for the driver into the RATING column USERINFO table. This method will also change the scene to scheduled.ViewDriver.fxml.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - the IO exception.
        java.sql.SQLException - the SQL exception.

      • performRatingCalculation

        public void performRatingCalculation(User person)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        When this method is called, it will add the new calculated rating for the driver into the RATING column USERINFO table. This method will also display a confirmation dialogue box to thank the user.
        Parameters:
        person - the type created from the row selection in the table view located in scheduled.ViewDriverController.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - the SQL exception.

      • pushAverageRatingToDatabase

        public static void pushAverageRatingToDatabase(User person)
                                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        When this method is called, it will add the new calculated user rating for the driver to the RATING column in the USERINFO table.
        Parameters:
        person - the the type created from the row selection in the table view located in scheduled.ViewDriverController.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - the SQL exception.
